name: NeoSMB
description:
A proof of concept of a free / fan port of NSMB for the Neo.Geo.

If u want to help development and make this game a real thing for the Neo.Geo please DONATE! 

You can also directly get access to advanced content such as dev tools and / or more recent demos (if available) through early access buttons.

Let me know what you think guys, all suggestions are welcome!! :)

You can also contact me through discord : https://discord.gg/3mKJfh
